LogicalTable.name: F0 Revenue Base Measures
LogicalTable.Description: This logical table contains metrics like Revenue, Billed Qty, with different types of aggregations like Sum, Count Distinct and logical calculations. This logical table is at the order level grain but is sourced from 3 alternate Logical Table Sources : one detail source at the order grain level, one aggregate source at the product-month grain, and one at the product-office-month grain. BIEE server will automatically go to the most appropriate source based on the level included in each user query.

LogicalColumn.name: Revenue
LogicalColumn.Description: Returns the Revenue from the Revenue Facts table with a Sum aggregation

Expr.name: Expr
Expr.ExprTextDesc: SUM("SampleApp Lite"."F0 Revenue Base Measures"."Revenue")

AttributeDefn.name: AttributeDefn
AttributeDefn.ExprTextDesc: "Sample App Lite Data"."".""."F11 Revenue Facts Aggregate"."Revenue"

LogicalColumn.name: Billed Quantity
LogicalColumn.Description: Returns the Billed Quantity from the Revenue Facts table with a Sum aggregation

Expr.name: Expr
Expr.ExprTextDesc: SUM("SampleApp Lite"."F0 Revenue Base Measures"."Billed Quantity")

AttributeDefn.name: AttributeDefn
AttributeDefn.ExprTextDesc: "Sample App Lite Data"."".""."F11 Revenue Facts Aggregate"."Units"

LogicalColumn.name: Discount Amount
LogicalColumn.Description: Returns the Discount Amount from the Revenue Facts table with a Sum aggregation

Expr.name: Expr
Expr.ExprTextDesc: SUM("SampleApp Lite"."F0 Revenue Base Measures"."Discount Amount")

AttributeDefn.name: AttributeDefn
AttributeDefn.ExprTextDesc: "Sample App Lite Data"."".""."F11 Revenue Facts Aggregate"."Discnt_Value"

LogicalColumn.name: # of Offices with Orders
LogicalColumn.Description: This metric counts the distinct number of orders in the query population. The aggregation is a Count Distinct aggregation

Expr.name: Expr
Expr.ExprTextDesc: COUNT(DISTINCT "SampleApp Lite"."F0 Revenue Base Measures"."# of Offices with Orders")

AttributeDefn.name: AttributeDefn
AttributeDefn.ExprTextDesc: "Sample App Lite Data"."".""."F10 Revenue Facts (Order grain)"."Office_Key"

LogicalColumn.name: # of Orders
LogicalColumn.Description: This metric counts the distinct number of orders in the query population. The aggregation is a Count Distinct aggregation

Expr.name: Expr
Expr.ExprTextDesc: COUNT(DISTINCT "SampleApp Lite"."F0 Revenue Base Measures"."# of Orders")

AttributeDefn.name: AttributeDefn
AttributeDefn.ExprTextDesc: "Sample App Lite Data"."".""."F10 Revenue Facts (Order grain)"."Order_Number"

LogicalColumn.name: # of Products with Orders
LogicalColumn.Description: This metric counts the distinct number of Products in the query population. The aggregation is a Count Distinct aggregation

Expr.name: Expr
Expr.ExprTextDesc: COUNT(DISTINCT "SampleApp Lite"."F0 Revenue Base Measures"."# of Products with Orders")

AttributeDefn.name: AttributeDefn
AttributeDefn.ExprTextDesc: "Sample App Lite Data"."".""."F11 Revenue Facts Aggregate"."Prod_Key"

LogicalColumn.name: Actual Unit Price
LogicalColumn.Description: This logical object calculates the Actua Unit Price by dividing Revenue by Units.

Expr.name: Expr
Expr.ExprTextDesc: "SampleApp Lite"."F0 Revenue Base Measures"."Revenue" / "SampleApp Lite"."F0 Revenue Base Measures"."Billed Quantity"

LogicalColumn.name: Target Unit Price
LogicalColumn.Description: This logical object calculates the Target Unit Price by dividing Target Revenue by Target Units.

Expr.name: Expr
Expr.ExprTextDesc: "SampleApp Lite"."F1 Targets Base Measures"."Target Revenue" / "SampleApp Lite"."F1 Targets Base Measures"."Target Quantity"

LogicalColumn.name: Avg Order Size
LogicalColumn.Description: This logical object calculates the Actual Average Oder Size by dividing Total Revenue by number of Distinct Orders.

Expr.name: Expr
Expr.ExprTextDesc: "SampleApp Lite"."F0 Revenue Base Measures"."Revenue" / "SampleApp Lite"."F0 Revenue Base Measures"."# of Orders"

LogicalColumn.name: Target Completion (Rev Pct)
LogicalColumn.Description: Calculates the completion percentage by dividing Actual revenue by Target Revenue. The result is then multiplied by 100.

Expr.name: Expr
Expr.ExprTextDesc: "SampleApp Lite"."F0 Revenue Base Measures"."Revenue" / "SampleApp Lite"."F1 Targets Base Measures"."Target Revenue" * 100

LogicalColumn.name: ---------- Dynamic Time Level ---------------------
LogicalColumn.Description: Header object, dummy not to be used in any queries

LogicalColumn.name: Period Ago Revenue
LogicalColumn.Description: Shows the period Ago Revenue. This calculation is dependent on the time grain that is set in the query by the user. If day object is in the query, then this metric will return Day Ago, if month then month ago...

Expr.name: Expr
Expr.ExprTextDesc: AGO("SampleApp Lite"."F0 Revenue Base Measures"."Revenue", 1)

LogicalColumn.name: Revenue Variation to Last Period
LogicalColumn.Description: Shows the variation between current period and period Ago Revenu. This calculation is dependent on the time grain that is set in the query by the user. If day object is in the query, then this metric will return variation to Day Ago, if month then variation to month ago...

Expr.name: Expr
Expr.ExprTextDesc: "SampleApp Lite"."F0 Revenue Base Measures"."Revenue" - "SampleApp Lite"."F0 Revenue Base Measures"."Period Ago Revenue"

LogicalColumn.name: Revenue Pct Var. to Last Period
LogicalColumn.Description: Shows the percentage variation between current period and period Ago Revenue. This calculation is dependent on the time grain that is set in the query by the user. If day object is in the query, then this metric will return variation to Day Ago, if month then variation to month ago...

Expr.name: Expr
Expr.ExprTextDesc: "SampleApp Lite"."F0 Revenue Base Measures"."Revenue Variation to Last Period" / "SampleApp Lite"."F0 Revenue Base Measures"."Period Ago Revenue" * 100

LogicalColumn.name: Trailing 3 Periods Revenue
LogicalColumn.Description: Shows the sum of current period plus 2 past Ago Revenue. This calculation is dependent on the time grain that is set in the query by the user. If day object is in the query, then this metric will return trailing 3 Days, if month then trailing 3 months...

Expr.name: Expr
Expr.ExprTextDesc: PeriodRolling("SampleApp Lite"."F0 Revenue Base Measures"."Revenue", -(2), 0)

LogicalColumn.name: ---------- Fixed Time Level ---------------------------
LogicalColumn.Description: Header object, dummy not to be used in any queries

LogicalColumn.name: Month Ago Revenue
LogicalColumn.Description: Shows the Month Ago Revenue. This calculation is not dependent on the query time grain and will always return the value as of month ago.

Expr.name: Expr
Expr.ExprTextDesc: AGO("SampleApp Lite"."F0 Revenue Base Measures"."Revenue", "SampleApp Lite"."H0 Time"."Month", 1)

LogicalColumn.name: Quarter Ago Revenue
LogicalColumn.Description: Shows the Quarter Ago Revenue. This calculation is not dependent on the query time grain and will always return the value as of Quarter ago.

Expr.name: Expr
Expr.ExprTextDesc: AGO("SampleApp Lite"."F0 Revenue Base Measures"."Revenue", "SampleApp Lite"."H0 Time"."Quarter", 1)

LogicalColumn.name: Year Ago Revenue
LogicalColumn.Description: Shows the Year Ago Revenue. This calculation is not dependent on the query time grain and will always return the value as of Year ago.

Expr.name: Expr
Expr.ExprTextDesc: AGO("SampleApp Lite"."F0 Revenue Base Measures"."Revenue", "SampleApp Lite"."H0 Time"."Year", 1)

LogicalColumn.name: Quarter to Date Revenue
LogicalColumn.Description: Shows the Quarter to date sum of Revenue. This calculation is not dependent on the query time grain.

Expr.name: Expr
Expr.ExprTextDesc: TODATE("SampleApp Lite"."F0 Revenue Base Measures"."Revenue", "SampleApp Lite"."H0 Time"."Quarter")

LogicalColumn.name: ----------- Level Based Measures -----------------
LogicalColumn.Description: Header object, dummy not to be used in any queries

LogicalColumn.name: Full Month Revenue
LogicalColumn.Description: Shows the full month sum of revenue.

Expr.name: Expr
Expr.ExprTextDesc: "SampleApp Lite"."F0 Revenue Base Measures"."Revenue"

LogicalColumn.name: Full Quarter Revenue
LogicalColumn.Description: Shows the full quarter sum of revenue.

Expr.name: Expr
Expr.ExprTextDesc: "SampleApp Lite"."F0 Revenue Base Measures"."Revenue"

LogicalColumn.name: All Offices Revenue
LogicalColumn.Description: Shows the sum of revenue for all offices.

Expr.name: Expr
Expr.ExprTextDesc: "SampleApp Lite"."F0 Revenue Base Measures"."Revenue"

LogicalColumn.name: All Products Revenue
LogicalColumn.Description: Shows the sum of revenue for all products.

Expr.name: Expr
Expr.ExprTextDesc: "SampleApp Lite"."F0 Revenue Base Measures"."Revenue"
